pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Project Files from a Template // Generate project files and directories following a pre-made template. You can specify variables to customize file names and content, and flexibly adapt the template to your needs. 'cookiecutter' for 'R' implements a subset of the excellent 'cookiecutter' package for the 'Python' programming language (https://github.com/cookiecutter/), and aims to be largely compatible with the original 'cookiecutter' template format.
